claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a table of a clinical study reporting Flublok vaccine efficacy in adults aged 18–49 years: it lists numbers of cases, rates (%) of influenza‐like illness, vaccine efficacy percentages (e.g., 44.6%, 54.4%, etc.), and 95% confidence intervals. There is no mention of regulatory approval status or official age indication on the slide—only efficacy outcomes in a trial population. Therefore, this image does not provide evidence that Flublok is approved for use in adults 18 years and older.
